prepare-you-event: To prepare your event we need certain information that we will ask you for below.
how-many-people: How many people do you expect at your event?
want-interaction: Do you want there to be interaction?
want-add-gifts: Do you want to add gifts, prize or any physical element?
event-objectives: What are the objectives of your event?
virtual-dynamic: Which of our virtual dynamics would you like in your event?
additional-comments: Write us additional comments about your event to take them into account
